problem.markdown:
Dan mentions "climate change" as one of the most important challenges in computing. Recall in Kathy Yelick's lecture on "Saving The World With Computing" she mentions the two most significant challenges in computing, which of the following did she mention other than 'climate change in our changing world'? (x) Health and Medicine ( ) Poverty ( ) Political Differences ( ) All of the above
[explanation] Mrs. Yelick mentions specifically that understanding the human body, developing treatments and preventing deseases are one of the most important challenges in computing today. [explanation]
